text: I have been in this medical aesthetic clinic for almost three years. The doctors and staff here are very good and I have seen results. The prices here are also very affordable. I will recommend more friends to come here.ðŸ˜Š

Highly Recommend V Medical Aesthetic!

Excellent service, professional staff, and a clean, modern clinic. The consultation was thorough, and the treatments were effective with natural-looking results. No hard sellingâ€”just genuine care and expertise. Will definitely return!

I had a fantastic experience at V medical tanjong pagar.The staff was incredibly knowledgeable and made me feel at ease from the moment I walked in. The treatment was painless, and the results are amazing! I highly recommend this clinic to anyone looking for high-quality aesthetic services.
Did my Pico & Acne treatment at Tanjong Pagar with Doctor Zachary and Doctor Adrian. Overall good environment and friendly staff.

Very disappointed with them. Their treatments are costly, not very effective and they keep pushing sales. They recommended Sylfirm package which costs a 5 figure sum for me and my husband.

After more than a year, I see slight improvement of my skin but I still have wrinkles, sagging skin, melasma and dark spots!!

As it was not effective, they tell you to buy other packages like yellow laser and other treatments. They should have remedy the situation by offering complimentary treatments to treat my skin and turn me to a satisfied customer. Not worth the money spent at all.

Update in May 2025:
Pico treatments diminished some of my pigmentation and my pores appeared smaller. Perhaps the business model should provide a variety of treatments based on each customerâ€™s needs and allow customers  change accordingly instead of selling fixed treatment packages.
